To accomplish this, he must go undercover and join Patrovina's gang.","poster_path":"/1Y2GgDyNJFELoSIVlRhFQSs23Uo.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[28,80,53],"popularity":32.055,"release_date":"1986-06-06","video":false,"vote_average":5.8,"vote_count":761},{"backdrop_path":"/rJw7mflYzuHXBdRYEJyjAXDru5t.jpg","id":9387,"title":"Conan the Barbarian","original_title":"Conan the Barbarian","overview":"A horde of rampaging warriors massacre the parents of young Conan and enslave the young child for years on The Wheel of Pain. Transforming himself into a killing machine, Conan travels into the wilderness to seek vengeance on Thulsa Doom, the man responsible for killing his family. In the wilderness, Conan takes up with the thieves Valeria and Subotai.
